nodes.text: Praxat Sil was a terrestrial astronomical object located within the Sava system. An entire civilization had formed on Praxat Sil, but collapsed before 10 BBY over the timing of an eclipse. While flying the starship Millennium Falcon through hyperspace, the droid L3-37 noticed Praxat Sil and its star system as they went past.
Praxat Sil was first mentioned in Last Shot, a novel written by Daniel José Older and published in 2018.
